name: 10% Vitamin C Complex Glow Body Lotion
categories: Bath & Body, Body Moisturizers, Body Lotions & Body Oils
about: What it is: A body lotion that provides an instant glow and helps balance skin's microbiome for gorgeous and healthy-looking skin...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily..Skincare Concerns: Dryness, Dullness, and Uneven Texture..Formulation: Cream..Highlighted Ingredients:- Vitamin C + Kumaru: Visibly brighten and illuminate..- Inulin Prebiotics: Help balance skin's microbiome and promote healthy-looking skin..- Viola: Increases skin hydration with a lightweight texture that won't clog pores...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: This innovative body lotion is designed to illuminate your skin, providing a daily dose of essential nutrients for a radiant and youthful glow. Prebiotic fermentation technology helps balance skin's microbiome. The luscious scent of lavender and zesty citrus notes revitalize and uplift the senses...Clean & Planet AwareOur ambitious curation of beauty made without controversial ingredients from brands dedicated to making meaningful environmental commitments, including sustainable ingredients and sourcing, packaging, corporate commitments, and consumer transparency.
ingredients: -Vitamin C + Kumaru: Visibly brighten and illuminate..-Inulin Prebiotics: Help balance skin's microbiome and promote healthy-looking skin..-Viola: Increases skin hydration with a lightweight texture that won't clog pores....Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice*, Glycerin*, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil*, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride†, Glyceryl Stearate†, Stearic Acid†, Propanediol†, Pentylene Glycol†, Cetyl Alcohol†, Stearyl Alcohol†, Glyceryl Caprylate†, Hydrolyzed Viola Tricolor Extract†, Bismuth Oxychloride†, 3-O-Ethyl Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C), Tocopherol (Vitamin E)†, Phyllanthus Emblica Fruit Extract†, Inulin†, Lactobacillus/Dipteryz Odorata Seed Ferment Filtrate†, Leuconostoc/Radish Root Ferment Filtrate†, Xanthan Gum†, Maltodextrin†, Glyceryl Undecylenate† Lavandula Hybrida Oil†, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil†, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Flower Oil†, Triethyl Citrate†....Potential allergens: Linalool†, D-Limonene†.*Certified Organic Ingredient.†Plant Derived...The list of ingredients is subject to change. Please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply on cleansed body and follow with a Juice Beauty sunscreen (sold separately) during the day. The fast-absorbing, luxuriously hydrating, lightweight texture won't leave a residue....Recycling Instructions:.-Place the empty container in the recycling bin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The smell is very natural and a bit strong but the feel of this on the skin is very nice! It’s non greasy and does feel very moisturizing with a hint on glow.

I received this sample in exchange of my honest review. I have a very sensitive dry skin. When I first tried this product I genuinely was surprised by how non greasy this was. It has a very nice smell that is not overpowering.  Also absorbed very quickly on my skin. Highly satisfied! And would recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this lotion for a couple of weeks. It’s non-greasy which I love but also still hydrates my skin. I tend to have dry skin especially my feet so I like that I can use this and not feel like I’m wearing a thick moisturizer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this 10% vitamin c complex glow body lotion free for sampling purposes. I was wow’ed by the results. I found the lotion non greasy and it gave my skin a nice glow while almost blurring my imperfections. Perfect for upcoming shorts/skirts weather.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for my honest review. I have been using this cream for the past week weeks and I am very pleased! Not only is the scent super nice but I love the texture of the cream and the packaging. I suffer from extremely dry legs and arms. This product is has helped to hydrate my skin and leaves beautiful and healthy glow! As the cream contains Vitamin C, make sure to wear sunscreen before going out in the sun. I would definitely repurchase this lotion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this body lotion. The lavender scent was lovely and relaxing. The lotion absorbed very quickly with very little white cast. My skin felt very hydrated and soft. The only barrier I see to this lotion is the cost I don’t spend that much on body lotion. It was really nice to have the opportunity to try a higher end brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I actually really like this body lotion, it leaves such a nice glow on your skin after! I also like that the scent isn’t too strong, it’s a nice spa like scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this body lotion since a while and it actually does brighten and hydrate skin very well. Impressed that it suits dry and sensitive skin and leaves a beautiful glow. It’cruelty

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for my honest review. It’s a nice thick hydrating lotion. There weren’t any noticeable differences between this and any other drug store brand creams. The scent is not my cup of tea at all but will finish the bottle on my legs. I would not purchase.  was

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this product for a few weeks now, and first off I have to say it smells fantastic. I suffer from very dry legs, and I can say this lotion sure improved that.  I loved that in the middle of the day I would wave my arm and get an aroma of the scent of this.  I will be repurchasing.  I found it left just a little but of slickness on my legs, but I don't mind.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve used this product for about more than a week, its definitely hydrated to my skin! I just loved the product! Definitely recommended

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This body lotion really brightened my skin and made it feel very hydrated and nourished. It also left such a nice slight shimmery glow, which I loved! My only wish is that it had a better scent. It still wasn’t bad but I was expecting a citrusy scent.  hoping for more of a
